name: Jigsaw Daily: Fun Calming Game
description:
Discover simply the best jigsaws! Play a new puzzle every day & enjoy our amazingly colorful HD images. Relax with a simple game or challenge your brain with more pieces.

** Simply Jigsaws **
- Forget distracting features, our puzzles are easy to play!
- Get a new FREE puzzle to solve every single day
- Choose from thousands of stunning HD images
- Never play the same puzzle cut twice - each one is dynamically cut
- Enjoy a relaxing game or challenge your puzzling skills
- Play with 4 to 100 pieces on your phone and up to 400 on your tablet!
- Choose custom options so you can play it your way
- Pick pieces from a 'tray', use a 'ghost image', choose a border and more
- Enjoy amazing gameplay based on over 10 years of puzzling experience

** Can't fall asleep or want to keep busy while you wait? **

No matter what the situation, this jigsaw puzzle app is the ideal solution to escape from hectic daily life. If playing real jigsaws has become too physically difficult or your pesky cat keeps stealing your puzzle pieces, our puzzles are perfect for keeping your brain active and your mind engaged. Best of all, you can play anytime, anywhere!

** Hundreds of Fun Puzzle Packs **

We have a jigsaw puzzle pack for everyone! From 'Amazing Colors' and 'Color Splash' to 'Gardening' and 'Baking', all our puzzles are top quality realistic HD images. Jigsaw Daily is great for players of all ages. Young kids can learn how to match colors, adults can improve focus and everybody can have fun!

** Customize Your Gameplay **

Choose from a variety of features to suit your puzzle preferences. You can drag your pieces from a 'tray' or sort them by hand, pick different colored backgrounds and even see a 'ghost image' for easy play. Decide how many pieces you want to play with and whether or not you want a puzzle border.

** Love an Addicting Challenge? **

The real beauty of Jigsaw Daily is its simplicity. If you just want quick easy fun then enter the app and enjoy your free daily puzzle without unnecessary points, levels and leaderboards. However, if you are looking to test your logic and skills then you can pick maximum pieces, and challenge yourself every time you play!

** No More Boxes **

There's nothing more rewarding than completing that last piece of a puzzle. There's nothing more annoying than losing the last piece of a puzzle! With this amazing mobile puzzle game you can take your jigsaws everywhere you go and never lose a piece again.

Enjoy simply the best jigsaw puzzles!
